channel.title: Profit-losses on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Profit & Loss
item.description: Overview This page provides an overview of the budgetary slippages between a company’s projected revenues and expenses, as well as its budget target over a given period of time. Below, you can see how much your company has earned or has lost during each month of the current year. This data is obtained by subtracting from the revenues of all the costs faced by the company. The costs can be of various kinds:
